user_bio: Gerald McAlister has been writing software for over a decade now. His latest adventures are currently going on at Amazon, as well as at his own LLC, RGB Schemes, during his spare time.
description: This is the personal website for Gerald McAlister. Visit it to learn more about who he is and what he does.

user_timeline.title: High School Graduation
user_timeline.subtitle: Mount Vernon High School
user_timeline.description: On this date, I graduated from Mount Vernon High School in Mount Vernon, Virginia. I finished with a GPA of 3.55 and an Advanced Diploma.

user_timeline.title: Faculty Support Worker
user_timeline.subtitle: Christopher Newport University
user_timeline.description: Began working as a student employee, helping students and faculty with hardware, software, and network issues. Helped with issues in classrooms, residence halls, and other buildings on campus.

user_timeline.title: Software Developer Intern
user_timeline.subtitle: Perfect Commerce
user_timeline.description: Began working as a Softare Developer Intern at Perfect Commerce (now called proactis). Helped to develop automated test cases in Selenium with Java. Also helped debug, fix, and enhance current and legacy code using ASP.NET in C# and JavaScript.

user_timeline.title: Software Engineer
user_timeline.subtitle: CW Optics
user_timeline.description: Helped to develop the software for usage of the WoundImager device. Implemented various algorithms created by the company, including one which was used to calculate the velocity of blood through wounds on images gathered from the device.

user_timeline.title: Research and Development Intern
user_timeline.subtitle: Swisslog
user_timeline.description: Researched new technologies to use for warehouse management, including hardware, software, usability, ease-of-access, safety, and more. Specifically developed rapid prototypes on hardware such as Google Glass and demonstrated to various executives both at Swisslog and outside of the company.

user_timeline.title: Software Engineer
user_timeline.subtitle: Swisslog
user_timeline.description: Switched from an intern to a full time Software Engineer at Swisslog. Worked on a variety of projects, including continuing R&D work, helping to improve documentation for certain products (reducing setup time by as much 60%), and mainted a 100% deployment success rate with no rollbacks being required for my changes on products.

user_timeline.title: Software Development Engineer
user_timeline.subtitle: Amazon
user_timeline.description: Working on the Alexa on Tablets to help bring Alexa to Amazon's Fire Tablets. I do a combination of Android development, server-side work, and Android source development.

user_timeline.title: University Graduation
user_timeline.subtitle: Christopher Newport University
user_timeline.description: On this date, I completed my undergraduate degrees in Computer Engineering and Computer Science at Christopher Newport University.

user_timeline.title: Began Undergraduate Degrees
user_timeline.subtitle: Christopher Newport University
user_timeline.description: On this date, I began my undergraduate degrees in Computer Engineering and Computer Science at Christopher Newport University.
